headline: Why Home Depot Stock Edged Higher on Tuesday
summary: On Tuesday, investors continued to digest Monday's news from Home Depot (NYSE: HD) that it had made a fresh acquisition.  Home Depot kicked off the business week by announcing that it had acquired specialty building products distributor GMS via a subsidiary.  Home Depot stated that the purchase will be financed through a mix of cash on hand and debt.

Home Depot stated that the purchase will be financed through a mix of cash on hand and debt.

summary: The home-improvement retailer has been deliberate in its efforts to win the pro contractor market.

headline: Buy Home Depot (HD) or GMS (GMS) Stock After Acquisition Announcement?
summary: Aiming to expand its reach to professional contractors, Home Depot (HD) announced it will be acquiring GMS Inc. (GMS) for $4.3 billion or $5.5 billion when including debt.
